mapper.insert:
select art_comments_seq.nextval from dual
insert into art_comments(cno, username, artno, write_date, profile, content, report_cnt) values(#{cno}, #{username}, #{artno}, sysdate, #{profile}, #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: select*from (select rownum as rnum, c.*from (select /*+ index_desc(art_comments art_comments_pk_rno) */ cno, username, write_date, profile, content, report_cnt from art_comments ) c where rownum <=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.delete: delete from art_comments where cno=#{cno} and rownum=1
